sentences.en: Don't hang around that shiftless guy. You don't know what he will do.
sentences.cn: 不要跟那个得过且过的混混在一起, 你不知道他会做些什么事.

sentences.en: He lives in a shiftless way.
sentences.cn: 他过着得过且过的日子。

sentences.en: In retrospect, I was a sad little boy and a standard-issue, shiftless, egotistical, dejected teen-ager.
sentences.cn: 回顾往事，我曾是一个悲哀的小男孩，一个无能的、任性的、沮丧的标准问题少年。

sentences.en: Laziness brings on deep sleep, and the shiftless man goes hungry.
sentences.cn: 懒惰使人沉睡, 懈怠的人必受饥饿.

sentences.en: That was little more than the shiftless Slatterys raised.
sentences.cn: 这个产量跟好吃懒做的斯莱特里家比也好不了多少.

trans.tran_cn: 懒惰的，得过且过的，没出息的
trans.tran_en: lazy and having no interest in working hard or trying to succeed
